title: How do I enable WiFi calling on a Pixel 3XL running Android 11? Unable to find the setting.
content: How do I enable WiFi calling on a Pixel 3XL running Android 11? The setting is not under Network and Internet > Mobile Network > Advanced. I think I recall seeing it there maybe a year ago but it's not there anymore. Has WiFi calling been de-supported on the Pixel 3XL?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
